Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that an "illegal Muslim from Iran" was arrested for starting the California wildfire, when there is no evidence to support this.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that there have been no arrests made in relation to the October wildfires, as confirmed by the California Department of Forestry and Fire Protection.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it falsely cites Fox News as the source of information, when in fact the network never reported on the arrest of a Muslim man for starting the fire.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes a problematic assumption by linking the arrest of a Muslim man to the California wildfire without any factual basis or evidence.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim neglects to consider alternative explanations for the cause of the wildfire, focusing solely on the arrest of a Muslim man as the alleged perpetrator.
